akn:section.akn:heading: Deferral or forgiveness of water and sewer fees for rehabilitated vacant rental housing.

akn:content.akn:p: Where vacant rental accommodations are being rehabilitated under this subchapter, the Mayor may defer or forgive any outstanding water and sewer fees owed by the property.

A project under this section shall be subject to certification by the Mayor that it is in the best interest of the District, and is consistent with the Districtâ€™s rental property needs in terms of its location, type, and variety of sizes of rental units.
